data.chText: 不用于进行时
data.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.chText: 看到；注意到；观察到
data.enText: to see or notice sb/sth

data.chText: 最近你注意到什么变化没有？
data.enText: Have you observed any changes lately?

data.chText: 小说中的人物个个栩栩如生。
data.enText: All the characters in the novel are closely observed (= seem like people in real life) .

data.chText: 警察注意到一个男人走进了银行。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+不带to的不定式

data.enText: The police observed a man enter the bank.

data.chText: 他们看见他走进银行。
data.enText: They observed him entering the bank.

data.chText: 她发现所有的椅子都有人坐了。
data.enText: She observed that all the chairs were already occupied.

data.chText: 有人看到他紧跟着她。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: He was observed to follow her closely.

data.text: This pattern is only used in the passive.
此句型仅用于被动语态。

data.chText: 观察；注视；监视
data.enText: to watch sb/sth carefully, especially to learn more about them

data.chText: 我觉得他正在注视着我做的每一件事。
data.enText: I felt he was observing everything I did.

data.chText: 这些病人被观察了数月之久。
data.enText: The patients were observed over a period of several months.

data.chText: 他们观看了机器零件的组装过程。
data.enText: They observed how the parts of the machine fitted together.

data.chText: 他观察敏锐，但言语寥寥。
data.enText: He observes keenly, but says little.

data.chText: 说话；评论
data.enText: to make a remark

data.chText: 她说天色晚了。
data.enText: She observed that it was getting late.

data.chText: 遵守（规则、法律等）
data.enText: to obey rules, laws, etc.

data.chText: 叛乱者会遵守停火协议吗？
data.enText: Will the rebels observe the ceasefire?

data.chText: 众人为死者默哀一分钟。
data.enText: The crowd observed a minute's silence (= were silent for one minute) in memory of those who had died.

data.chText: 庆祝；庆贺；欢度
data.enText: to celebrate festivals, birthdays, etc.

data.chText: 他们过不过圣诞节？
data.enText: Do they observe Christmas?

data.chText: 以上各词均指口头或书面说明事实或发表意见。
data.enText: These words all mean to say or write a fact or opinion.
comment

data.chText: 指发表意见或说明事实：
data.enText: to express an opinion or give facts about sth

data.chText: 在审判结果出来之前他拒绝给予任何评论。
data.enText: He refused to comment until after the trial.
note

data.chText: 指特别提到或指出：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to mention sth because it is important or interesting

data.chText: 他顺便提到该公司在安全方面的记录不好。
data.enText: He noted in passing that the company's record on safety issues was not good.
remark

data.chText: 指说起、谈论、评论：
data.enText: to say or write what you have noticed about a situation

data.chText: 评论家指出这部戏剧缺乏创意。
data.enText: Critics remarked that the play was not original.
observe

data.chText: 指说起、谈论、评论：
data.enText: ( formal ) to say or write what you have noticed about a situation

data.chText: 她说天色晚了。
data.enText: She observed that it was getting late.

data.chText: 用comment、remark还是observe？
comment on表示谈论某事，remark on或observe表示谈论或评论注意到的事物。以上三词通常无大的区别，但拒绝评论可用refuse to comment（不带on），不能说refuse to remark或refuse to observe（不带on）：
data.enText: If you comment on sth you say sth about it; if you remark on sth or observe sth, you say sth about it that you have noticed: there is often not much difference between the three. However, while you can refuse to comment (without on ), you cannot ‘refuse to remark’ or ‘refuse to observe’ (without on ).
He refused to remark/observe until after the trial.
comment, remark or observe?
to comment/note/remark/observe that…
to comment on/note/remark/observe how…
‘It's long,’ he commented/noted/remarked/observed.
to comment/remark on sth
to comment/remark/observe to sb

data.text: look ♦ watch ♦ see ♦ view ♦ observe ♦ regard

data.chText: 以上各词均含看、观看之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to turn your eyes in a particular direction.
look

data.chText: 指看、瞧：
data.enText: to turn your eyes in a particular direction

data.chText: 你要是仔细看，从这里就可以看见我们的房子。
data.enText: If you look carefully you can just see our house from here.

data.chText: 她看了看我，笑了。
data.enText: She looked at me and smiled.
watch

data.chText: 指看、注视、观看、观察：
data.enText: to look at sb/sth for a time, paying attention to what happens

data.chText: 看电视
data.enText: to watch television

data.chText: 你注意看我的动作，然后试着做。
data.enText: Watch what I do, then you try.
see

data.chText: 指观看（比赛、电视节目、演出等）：
data.enText: to watch a game, television programme, performance, etc.

data.chText: 晚上，我们去看了一场电影。
data.enText: In the evening we went to see a movie.
view

data.chText: 指看、观看（尤指仔细观察）；看（电视、电影等）：
data.enText: ( formal ) to look at sth, especially when you look carefully; to watch television, a film/movie, etc.

data.chText: 观众从世界各地涌来欣赏她的作品。
data.enText: People came from all over the world to view her work.

data.chText: 用watch、see还是view？
可以说see/view a film/movie/programme，但不能说：
data.enText: You can see/view a film/movie/programme but you cannot
see/view television

data.chText: view较see正式，尤用于商务语境。
data.enText: View is more formal than see and is used especially in business contexts.
watch, see or view?
observe

data.chText: 指观察、注视、监视：
data.enText: ( formal ) to watch sb/sth carefully, especially to learn more about them or it

data.chText: 这些病人被观察了数月之久。
data.enText: The patients were observed over a period of several months.
regard

data.chText: 尤指以某种方式注视、凝视：
data.enText: to look at sb/sth, especially in a particular way

data.chText: 他以怀疑的眼光看着我们。
data.enText: He regarded us suspiciously.
to look/watch for sb/sth
to watch/observe what/who/how…
to look/watch/view/observe/regard (sb/sth) in/with amazement/surprise/disapproval, etc.
to look (at sb/sth)/watch (sb/sth)/observe sb/sth/regard sb/sth carefully/closely/intently
to watch/see/view a film/movie/programme
to watch/see a match/game/fight

data.text: notice ♦ note ♦ detect ♦ observe ♦ witness ♦ perceive

data.chText: 以上各词均含看到、注意到之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to see sth, especially when you pay careful attention to it.
notice

data.chText: 指看（或听）到、注意到、意识到、注意、留意：
data.enText: to see, hear or become aware of sb/sth; to pay attention to sb/sth

data.chText: 我首先注意到的是这屋子里的气味。
data.enText: The first thing I noticed about the room was the smell.
note

data.chText: 指注意、留意：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to notice or pay careful attention to sth

data.chText: 请注意办事处星期一将关闭。
data.enText: Please note (that) the office will be closed on Monday.

data.chText: 该词在商务英语中非常通用：
data.enText: This word is very common in business English.

data.chText: 注意这些价格含增值税。
data.enText: Note that the prices are inclusive of VAT.
detect

data.chText: 指发现、查明、侦察出：
data.enText: to discover or notice sth, especially sth that is not easy to see, hear, etc.

data.chText: 这些检查旨在早期查出疾病。
data.enText: The tests are designed to detect the disease early.
observe

data.chText: 指看到、注意到、观察到：
data.enText: ( formal ) to see or notice sb/sth

data.chText: 最近你注意到什么变化没有？
data.enText: Have you observed any changes lately?

data.chText: 警察注意到一个男人走进了银行。
data.enText: The police observed a man enter the bank.
witness

data.chText: 指当场看到、目击：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to see sth happen

data.chText: 警方呼吁目击这一事件的人与他们联系。
data.enText: Police have appealed for anyone who witnessed the incident to contact them.
perceive

data.chText: 指注意到、意识到、察觉到：
data.enText: ( formal ) to notice or become aware of sth, especially sth that is not obvious

data.chText: 我注意到他的举止在那几个月里有些改变。
data.enText: I perceived a change in his behaviour over those months.
to notice/note/detect/observe/perceive that/how/what/where/who…
to notice/observe/witness sth happen/sb do sth
to barely/hardly/scarcely notice/detect/observe
to be commonly/frequently noticed/noted/observed
to be worth noticing/noting/observing
sb can't/couldn't help noticing/noting/observing

simple_means.memory_skill: ob 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 一再保持；坚持〔看〕→ 遵守

ex.chText: 看黑板。
ex.enText: Look at the blackboard.

ex.chText: 瞧瞧我的新车。
ex.enText: Look at my new car.

ex.chText: 她蒙上眼睛，不敢看。
ex.enText: She covered her eyes, afraid to look.

synonyms.bx: 侧重短暂的看的动作，但并不一定能看见，有时用来唤起别人的注意。

ex.chText: 我们难以观察到月亮的另一面。
ex.enText: The far side of the moon is difficult for us to observe.

ex.chText: 数以千计的人观看了轮船离港下水的情形。
ex.enText: Thousands of people observed the ship leaving the harbour.

ex.chText: 这名科学家仔细观察标本。
ex.enText: The scientist carefully observed the specimen.

synonyms.bx: 指注意到某事物，或为了解某人、某事而对其进行仔细观察。

ex.chText: 我发觉他的行为有些变化。
ex.enText: I perceived a change in his behaviour.

ex.chText: 我看不出这些图片有什么差别。
ex.enText: I can't perceive any difference between these pictures.

ex.chText: 她被视为未来的总裁。
ex.enText: She is perceived as the future president.

synonyms.bx: 指发现或意识到某事；也指以某种方式理解某人或某事。

ex.chText: 他看了看，但什么也没有看见。
ex.enText: He looked but saw nothing.

ex.chText: 从这儿可以看到好几英里远。
ex.enText: You can see for miles from here.

ex.chText: 你昨晚看那个节目了吗？
ex.enText: Did you see that programme last night?

synonyms.bx: 侧重看的结果；也指眼睛看得见或观看比赛、电视节目等。

ex.chText: 看电视
ex.enText: watch television

ex.chText: 下次你们参观动物园，要仔细观察老虎。
ex.enText: Next time you visit the zoo, watch the tigers carefully.

ex.chText: 你能推荐一个我们可以观看美丽日出的地方吗？
ex.enText: Can you recommend a place where we can watch the beautiful sunrise?

synonyms.bx: 指在一段时间内关注某人或某事。

ex.chText: 一个好公民必须守法。
ex.enText: A good citizen must obey the law.

ex.chText: 军人应当毫无异议地服从命令。
ex.enText: Soldiers are expected to obey orders without questioning them.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指依据法律法规行事，也指服从某种权威。

ex.chText: 我们必须遵守新的规定。
ex.enText: We have to abide by the new rules.

ex.chText: 她会信守诺言的。
ex.enText: She will abide by her promise.

ex.chText: 他们必须服从裁判的决定。
ex.enText: They have to abide by the refree's decision.

synonyms.bx: 指依照法规、协议、决定等行事，含即使不同意也必须接受并服从之意。

ex.chText: 按照规定饮食/采用规定食谱
ex.enText: follow a diet/recipe

ex.chText: 你为什么不听医生的劝告？
ex.enText: Why didn't you follow the doctor's advice?

ex.chText: 注意按照指示进行。
ex.enText: Take care to follow the instructions.

synonyms.bx: 指接受劝告、听从指示等，强调按照别人所告知、示范等的内容去做。

ex.chText: 这项新法律必须严格遵守。
ex.enText: This new law must be strictly observed/obeyed.

ex.chText: 双方都遵守了停火协定。
ex.enText: Both sides have observed/obeyed the ceasefire.

synonyms.bx: 指奉行法律、协议、习俗等，常可与 obey 换用。

example: The pianist kept time with the metronome
I cannot keep track of all my employees
She observed that his presentation took up too much time
They noted that it was a fine day to go sailing

tr: observe with care or pay close attention to
example: Take note of this chemical reaction

tr: discover or determine the existence, presence, or fact of
example: She detected high levels of lead in her drinking water
We found traces of lead in the paint
Please observe the reaction of these two chemicals

tr: follow with the eyes or the mind
example: Keep an eye on the baby, please!
She followed the men with the binoculars

tr: behave as expected during of holidays or rites
conform one's action or practice to
example: We kept to the original conditions of the contract

value.def: If you observe a person or thing, you watch them carefully, especially in order to learn something about them.

example.ex: Stern also studies and observes the behaviour of babies...
example.tran: 斯特恩还研究观察婴儿的行为。

example.ex: Are there any classes I could observe?...
Our sniper teams observed them manning an anti-aircraft gun.
example.tran: 我们的狙击队观看他们操作高射炮。

value.def: If you observe someone or something, you see or notice them.

example.ex: In 1664 Hooke observed a reddish spot on the surface of the planet.
example.tran: 1664年，胡克注意到这颗行星表面有一块微红的斑点。

value.def: If you observe that something is the case, you make a remark or comment about it, especially when it is something you have noticed and thought about a lot.

example.ex: We observe that the first calls for radical transformation did not begin until the period of the industrial revolution...
example.tran: 我们认为直到工业革命时期才出现了要求彻底变革的第一波呐喊。

example.ex: 'He is a fine young man,' observed Stephen.
example.tran: “他是个很不错的小伙子，”斯蒂芬评论道。

value.tran: （尤指就注意到或深思熟虑之事）说，评论，评述

value.def: If you observe something such as a law or custom, you obey it or follow it.

example.ex: Imposing speed restrictions is easy, but forcing motorists to observe them is trickier...
example.tran: 限制车速容易，但强制司机遵守这些限速规定就难办多了。

example.ex: The army was observing a ceasefire...
American forces are observing Christmas quietly.
example.tran: 美国部队正在悄悄地庆祝圣诞节。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to serve, to keep 服务；保持
rootsaffixes.title: serv

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 都保持下来 → 保存 → 保存原有风俗习惯不愿破坏 → 保守
con 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 保存；保持
con 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + ative 有…倾向（性质）的，属于…的 → 保守的
de 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 一再保持 → 值得
dis 不 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 不保持 → 损害
ob 表加强 + serv 服务；保持 + ance 表状况 → 惯例；遵守
ob 表加强 + serv 服务；保持 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 保持〔看〕→ 观察
ob 表加强 + serv 服务；保持 + atory 场所 → 观察星象的场所 → 天文台
ob 加强 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 一再保持；坚持〔看〕→ 遵守
pre 预先 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 预先保留 → 保存
re 一再 + serv 服务；保持 + e → 一再保持 → 保留
re 一再 + serv 服务；保持 + ed 表形容词 → 保留的；沉默的
serv 服务；保持 + ant 表人 → 提供服务的人 → 仆人
serv 服务；保持 + ice 行为 → 服务
service 服务 + able 能…的 → 能提供服务的 → 有用的
serv 服务；保持 + ile 易于…的 →〔被迫为别人〕服务的 → 奴隶的
ob 逆，倒；反对，否定 + ject 扔 → 逆着〔某物〕扔〔东西〕→ 反对
ob 逆，倒；反对，否定 + loqu 说话 + y 表状态 → 说不好的话 → 辱骂；指责
ob 逆，倒；反对，否定 + struct 建造 → 反着建 → 妨碍
ob 逆，倒；反对，否定 + vers 转 + e → 倒转过来 → 正面
op 逆，倒；反对，否定 + pon 放置 + ent 表人 → 反着站 → 对手
op 逆，倒；反对，否定 + pos 放 + e → 放在〔某物〕的对立面 → 反对
op 逆，倒；反对，否定 + posit 放 + e 对着〔某物〕放的 → 对立的
ob 表加强 + dur 持久，坚硬 + ate 有…性质的 → 固执的
ob 表加强 + long 长 → 长方形
ob 表加强 + nox 毒 + ious …的 → 歹毒的 → 可憎的
ob 表加强 + serv 保持 + e → 一直保持 → 遵守
ob 表加强 + sess〔 = sit坐〕→ 坐着不走 → 迷住
ob 表加强 + tain 拿住 → 稳稳拿住 → 获得
ob 表加强 + trud 推，冲 + e → 硬是向前推 → 强加
op 表加强 + press 压 → 压下去 → 压迫
oppress的名词
